TextView.android:text:
Society of automotive Engineers (SAE) is a World-Wide organization which sets standards and validates automotive projects. A student branch of this organization exists in UVCE. The motto of SAE-INDIA stands as ‘The Engineering Society for Advancing Mobility in Land Sea Air and Space’.

GKDC (go-cart building championship), BAJA (Pronounced as BAHA, is an all-terrain vehicle building championship), SUPRA (Racing car building championship) are the main National Level competition organised by SAE.

The student branch of SAE, ‘SAE-INDIA UVCE’ was set up in 2011 due to the earnest efforts of Mechanical Students of Batch 2009-2013. The club till date has involved in conducting many activities to benefit the members for improving their skills in the technical field.

Team Em-power UVCE stood 6th (AIR) in GKDC and 124th(AIR) In BAJA are some of the acclaimed achievements of the group till date.

Email: sae.uvce@gmail.com 

Contact: Adithya Pai (9446325235)
